name: Breakout Hero
blurb: Breakout Hero is a breakout inspired indie game being developed by Levelo. The game features weapons, spells, and fantasy monsters!

rewards.reward: Breakout Squire: This tier deserves a thank you as every bit is appreciated. For being of Squire class you shall be presented with 2 HD 2k x 1k wallpapers. One featuring the Levelo logo and the other featuring the Breakout Hero game.

Breakout Knight: This tier deserves an even greater thank you. For being of Knighthood you shall not only be presented with the 2 HD wallpapers of Squire class, but also a special Knight Tier edition of the Breakout Hero demo featuring 4 additional weapons with 4 additional spells!

Breakout ArchKnight: This tier deserves respect as only those of honor wear the title ArchKnight. For being of ArchKnight fame you shall be presented with the 2 HD wallpapers (Sometime in September), special Knight Tier edition of the Breakout Hero Demo (Sometime in September), and when Breakout Hero is finished...you will be given the game before anyone else and for free!

Breakout Angel: This tier deserves praise as only those who are holy deserve the title of Angel. For being of Angel class you shall be presented with a special Knight Tier edition of the Breakout Hero Demo (Sometime in September), when Breakout Hero is finished...you will be given the game before anyone else and for free, and your name will appear in the credits of Breakout Hero under the Angel Class of the project backers. Every Breakout Hero will know your name.

Breakout Hero: This is the ultimate tier attainable by humans. As a Hero, your name will be known far and wide for your heroic deeds. As a Hero you shall be presented with treasures aplenty. 

You will receive:   

·2 HD wallpapers (Sometime in September)   // 

·A special Knight Tier edition of the Breakout Hero Demo (Sometime in September)     //

·When Breakout Hero is finished...you will be given the game before anyone else and for free!
//
·Your name will appear in the credits of Breakout Hero under the Heroes section of the project backers. 
//
·A 5-10 minute Developer's Diary video showcasing the process behind Breakout Hero and a more personal look into my story as an indie game developer. (Sometime in September)
//
·Access to Kickstarter Polls, you will determine new Weapons, Monsters, and Levels for Breakout Hero. Your input will influence the final version of the game!

Breakout God: You have achieved immortality. You will be eternally thanked and praised. For being a God you will be presented with EVERYTHING in the Breakout Hero tier AND you will have personal inputs on what you would like to see in a level designed solely by the Gods. This includes, level design, shop design, monster design. You can even appear as NPCs in the Breakout Hero Game with your own names or aliases being used. Your name will appear under the Gods section of the project backers. This is a limited tier, there can only be 10 superiors to all else.
